   ABOR   ADAT   ALLO   APPE   AUTH   CDUP   CLNT   CWD 
   DELE   EPRT   EPSV   FEAT   HASH   HELP   LIST   MDTM
   MFMT   MKD    MLSD   MLST   MODE   NLST   NOOP   NOP 
   OPTS   P@SW   PASS   PASV   PBSZ   PORT   PROT   PWD 
   QUIT   REST   RETR   RMD    RNFR   RNTO   SITE   SIZE
   STOR   STRU   SYST   TYPE   USER   XCUP   XCWD   XMKD
   XPWD   XRMD
214 Have a nice day.

News & Announcements

  1. F.Y. 2020 Budget Items

    See the link below for all documents related to the development of F.Y. 2020 Budget. Read on...

  2. Notice of Public Hearing

    Notice is hereby given that a public hearing is scheduled for 5:30 P.M. April 15, 2019 on the proposed Tax Rates for Calendar Year 2019 and proposed F.Y. 2020 Budget. Read on...

  3. CDBG Annual Action Plan

    The City of Radford invites comments on its 2019 Annual Action Plan, which will be submitted to the US Dept of HUD on or about May 15, 2019. T Read on...

  4. April is Environmental Awareness Month

    April is Environmental Awareness Month in Radford. To see a list of events and learn more about Radford's Environmental Programs click the link below. Read on...

  5. ACCE Program

    To learn more about the ACCE program visit the link below. Read on...

  6. Speed Limit Change on West Main Street

    The speed limit on West Main Street, at the Rock Road intersection will change from 55mph to 45mph during the week of March 25, 2019. Read on...

  7. F.Y. 2020 Budget Calendar

    Below is the calendar for the development of the F.Y. 2020 Budget Read on...

  8. Radford Welcomes Food City to the Business Community

    Construction on a new Food City development project is set to begin May 1st with a projected completion date of December 2019. Read on...
/CivicAlerts.aspx
